text: Yi Huiman (Chinese: 易会满, born December 1964) is a Chinese banker, and the chairman of China Securities Regulatory Commission. He is the former chairman of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China. Yi was born in Cangnan County, Zhejiang and graduated from Hangzhou Dianzi University with an associate degree in statistics. ==References== Category:Chinese bankers Category:Businesspeople from Wenzhou Category:Living people Category:Nanjing University alumni Category:Alternate members of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China Category:1964 births Category:Politicians from Wenzhou Category:Communist Party of China politicians from Zhejiang Category:People's Republic of China politicians from Zhejiang
title: Yi Huiman
